results.title: A Story to inspire
results.creator_credit: Tanika Deemal-Parker, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Tanika Deemal-Parker has been singing all her life. She has been encouraged by her mum to take her singing further and, when doubts set in, it was her mum that helped her through with some words of wisdom.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tanika Deemal-Parker, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Step by step
results.creator_credit: Sam Kluk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sam Kluk loved his beautiful town of Kuranda in Northern Queensland. Unfortunately, there was another side to the quiet town and Kluk was determined to take every opportunity to escape it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sam Kluk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: My beach
results.creator_credit: Richard Sagigi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Life, for Richard Sagigi, was never always easy. Times at school when he was getting into trouble forced him to move to another school. But he knows that he can reconnect with himself on the beach where his family live, digging for turtle eggs, learning about animal conservation and meeting people from different cultures.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Richard Sagigi, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Life in the Kimberleys
results.creator_credit: Rhys Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Rhys Bedford has a lot of doors open to him, now that he is the recipient of a scholarship at Hale College in Western Australia. But it is when he returns to his family in Kununurra that Bedford gets to explore and reconnect with his country and heritage.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Rhys Bedford, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Grandma Jessie
results.brief_description: In this very personal story, Stephanie King pays tribute to her Grandma Jessie and reflects on the influence her upbringing by her grandmother has had on her own education and outlook.

results.title: The Best life
results.creator_credit: Keifer Yu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Keifer Yu takes us beyond the tourist attractions of Broome, Western Australia, to the cultures therein. Yu focuses on the Indigenous and Chinese cultures of which he is a part. He considers how the differing cultures have enriched his life and how they blend in together in this unique community.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Keifer Yu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Keifer Yu takes us beyond the tourist attractions of Broome, Western Australia, to the cultures therein. Yu focuses on the Indigenous and Chinese cultures of which he is a part. He considers how the differing cultures have enriched his life and how they blend in together in this unique community.

results.title: Living with disaster: stories and experiences from disasters
results.brief_description: ‘Living with disaster’ is a major project by ACMI in collaboration with the Attorney General’s Department through its Emergency Management division and the CFA, in order to capture stories of young people who have survived natural disasters.
results.title_for_label: Living with disaster: stories and experiences from disasters

group_works.title: When a fire comes to you

results.title: The Road home
results.brief_description: One of the most dramatic stories from a young aspiring filmmaker with autism who lost everything - his home, his camera and film equipment. Starting to rebuild now and a strong family network.
results.description: One of the most dramatic stories from a young aspiring filmmaker with autism who lost everything - his home, his camera and film equipment. Starting to rebuild now and a strong family network.

results.title: Into the flames
results.brief_description: A personal account of ‘Black Saturday’ bushfires from a young leader, a volunteer from CFA Region 14. Simon speaks of his experiences fighting the blaze - monitoring where campers are located, through to anger from local residents directed at his crew in the heat and panic of the fires.

results.title: In a knot
results.brief_description: ‘Warburton, which is practically my life.’ A sparse story, fairly poetic, about her stress and anxiety and fighting with her family. Amazing photos - from a light plane looking over the ‘Black Saturday’ affected areas.
